Room.Name: Jungle Clearing
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing in a slightly cleared area in the jungle of Uland Island.
Room.LongDescription: Looking to the east through the heavy brush, you can barely make out a ruined temple, long abandoned and forgotten. It looks like it was built in the form of a truncated pyramid, but several large stones, which must weigh tons, are in a jumble near the entrance. Looks like an earthquake might have shattered the ediface, as the entrance is caved in.
